name: FORSYTH_StarLordAdventure
description: In this rpg you play as the star lord the only person who is able to hold the power of the stars in your hands. Within this level you are trapped in a forest full of giant killer bees and the only way out is by opening the skeleton treasure chest with the skeleton key. However the key is locked behind the door and you have no way to unlock it. As you walk through the forest you find the warrior who holds the key to the door but in exchange he asks that you bring him four powerful stars. You must go around the map collecting stars while avoiding the angry forest bees that try to stop you. Once you have collected all the stars you may then take them back to the warrior who will grant you with a key to open the door. Once the door is open then you can acquire the skeleton key to open the chest. There is another mysterious person in the woods who informs you that the skeleton key is really a teleportation device when connected to the chest and you can finally escape the first. Once you touch the key to the chest you are teleported out of the forest to a red coin once the coin is acquired you have won the game and escaped the forest.
